product_name: Mavic Crossroc Disc 29er Wheelset with Tires
long_description: The Mavic Crossroc Disc 29er wheelset with tires offer dependable performance for 29er singletrack adventures. Plus, they are designed for tubeless conversion to increase traction, speed and control. Universal Standard Tubless (UST) compatable rims let you convert to tubeless tires to increase speed, durability and traction for serious mountain bike descents and racing. Sturdy aluminum rims are strengthened where the spokes exert the greatest stress, improving life expectancy and durability. Double-sealed cartridge bearings deliver excellent longevity and smooth spinning. Included ARC tires offer excellent all-around traction with an extra layer of reinforced casing to deter flats. Both wheels feature 24 straight-pull, bladed spokes laced in a 2-cross pattern for excellent strength, resilience and stiffness. Front hub is compatible with 15mm thru-axle; rear hub is compatible with 12 x 135mm axles (12 x 142mm with included adapter). For use with 6-bolt disc brake systems. Wheelset comes with rim tape, UST valve and accessories for tubeless conversion, rear quick-release (QR) skewer, rear QR adapter and Presta/Schrader valve converter.
